reviews.review_msg: good course & great learning atmosphere, this course can improve your mandarin speaking skill.

This class is pretty easy if u can speak a little mandarin. However there is a fair amount of work to be done: quiz and assignment each week. However u don't really have to know how to write mush chinese (speaking is the main point here). The exam is a 15 min "talk" with the prof . This is not an easy class to bump up your grade.

She is really great. She even helps you if you have trouble registering for the course. Also if you don't know how to say some mandarin, she is willing to stay behind and help you after class. She is really nice, and she will make sure you know how to say one word before going on to another. Small class size.
